column5: I heard from Rose. She inquired about job opportunities in Tennessee. It's been a while.
Yeah, I haven't talked to her in 3-4 years, but I'll always remember her. (and apparently so will WC)
Internet forums are kind of a Hotel California deal...
Trolling, trolling, trolling... He'll never leave. But we can hope. Al
That reminds me of a song I would sing for tournaments....... Trolling, trolling trolling.......keep them lines a trolling.........WALLEYE....ALRIGHT ! ! ! LOL
Santa knows you've been bad. He's bringing you 10,000 more posts from v-bay gord. Maybe we can talk about Putin in the New Year!
Great, just great. Just, flipping pancakes great........ Allen, this is all on you. PjShorthorn
I've put him on my ignore list, but people keep quoting him so that only helps a bit, but ya, I'll take the blame, I'm married and use to it. Al
Over 5,000 views Al.......quit peeking.
Yup, I understand the married thing. I'm sure there will be many folks that keep you informed on doings by V-Bay Gord. PjShorthorn
Keep it friendly banter, guys....or, just move on without posting. Thanks...
Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Geez, the hard water season hasn't even started and the"natives" are getting restless! This could be a long winter
Looks like Christmas came early this year,
I predict a lump of coal in your Christmas stocking this year, or if you're lucky, some socialized medicine.......
Nailed it.
This!!!There is no escape!

"The owners of Walleye Message Central reserve the right to remove, edit, move or close any thread for any reason."This is a line from the "Terms of Service Agreement" everyone agrees to when register for WC. All you need to do a search of every thread you ever started or commented on and add derogatory comments to each thread. You only have 2300 threads and comments to find so you should be completely deleted from WC in 5 to 10 years. Of course there are all those forwarded shares of WC posts to the rest of the internet so finding them would take some additional time.

Leave it to Gord the ATTENTION SEEKER to stir the pot so early in the offseason. hahahaha... guys, we run out of things to talk about. Relax, its simply a conversation, and no negativity needs to be tossed around. Anyhow, this thread got me thinking about Rose. She and John purchased Cliff Lake about the same time that I got in the business (going on 11 years now). I looked up her info, and all threads and topics were still there. She posted 3-4 times in 2012... but hasn't really posted here since 2008. Crazy how time flies. Time flies but walleye central topics are forever!
Obabikon, the real skill is to stir the pot without the sensitive folk realizing it. "Shaken, not stirred" ...007
Just stop jabbering and you'll soon be forgotten like so many others.. It's not like you're a disciple.

True, but I couldn't sleep at night knowing WC didn't have some "Canadian perspective" whether you want it or not. It's like getting your teeth cleaned......you hate it but you know it's good for you. Besides, Draco1206 once referred to me as "Lord Gord" and that comes with some responsibility...........
Actually, I think you were first called a preacher first and then Lord Gord. Attached is a gentle reminder of your true place in WC land. PjShorthorn.
You are confused and actually it's the other way around. We are trying to save YOU from socialism.. . Please pay attention, there will be tests on this..........LOL.......
If you are just seeking attention, you ask the question on a forum for all to see. If you truly want to delete your info, you contact the board administrator.
...beg to differ
Amen

Gord, seek attention? More like people seek Gord's attention. I also agree that he is not a disciple. He has disciples, though. Leave it to the administrators to provide the practical answer... Fish On! Hooks Camp boat Whatever motor they give me broken down beater car borrow my friends fish finder I have a few KMart special fishing poles
Dos Equis, could it be he is the most interesting man in Canada? Stay inquisitive my friends.
How do you remove yourself from WC?
Its the internet......you are there forever.

Why do you want to delete yourself? On other sites I am around, if something bad is happening to them ie harrassment etc, sometimes the owner/moderator will delete your profile for you. It would be tough for you to delete over 2,000 posts though.
Good byeSent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
That's what I thought......we are all stuck in purgatory together! As a rhetorical question it is interesting that you can join but you can never leave. Perhaps that is REW's secret to longevity..

This site and others are what we make of them I guess. They can provide entertainment, information, anger and rage amoung some. There are some people who their joy comes from trying to antagonize as many people a day as they can. I've learned to really try and ignore those as they have no interest in contributing anything to the site or it's members. Others are amazing at the info they provide fixing and repairing things. Finding schematics, diagrams ect. Then my favorites are those who only think the world revolves the way they think. Of course what would any site be witout the guys who post jokes and fun stories. So yes we can stay or go away from being active or we can select what interests us and ignore the rest.

Well said. Personally, I do my best to ignore the negative attacks and try as best as I can not to respond to them when they are directed towards me. Not saying I'm perfect, but I do try to keep to the high road.
Just like the great song say's Gord, "you can check out anytime you want, but you can NEVER leave". LOL
Just like Ann Lander's........REW is on it's third person posting.........LOL

I hope that you are here for at least one day after I am gone, Gord. I get a lot from your posts, whether it be simple fishing information, stuff from around the Vermilion area, or just good humor. For what it's worth.
